page.title: 06Children and Leisure.
page.content: In the Waterloo area children have a good opportunitiy to do a lot of different sports.Many people go to Ashton Moss.Ashton Moss is used by the East Cheshire Harriers,and many different football teams.It is also used by people who play cricket.Many people like to go swimming at the local Ashton swimming baths.A lot of girls go roller-skating at Wheels and Roller City.Also people like playing tennis on Store Street Park.Nearly every boy enjoys Breakin and Poppin and if they really like it they go to a club called Street Life which is based in Oldham.Rounders is very popular in schools.Fishing is not very popular.A few of the boys are in boys brigade band and they play many different instruments. {JANE BIBBY and PAMELA CROWHURST
